IPCA: Force used against prisoner who was ‘stomped on and slapped’ unjustified; officer charged https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/ipca-force-used-against-prisoner-who-was-stomped-on-and-slapped-unjustified-officer-charged/LMJH6SRUCZCEJCVCEGL6OTAWVQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/ipca-force-used-against-prisoner-who-was-stomped-on-and-slapped-unjustified-officer-charged/LMJH6SRUCZCEJCVCEGL6OTAWVQ/ Tracy NealTwo of the custody officers have since left and one pleaded guilty to common assault. Photo / Brett Phibbs
